prodNameC: 美堅希堤亞萬古黴素試劑
ingredientsDesc:
Reagent:
1EA Reconstitution Buffer: Contains TES (n-tris [hydroxylmethyl] methyl-2-aminoethane sulfonic acid), 30μg/mL mouse monoclonal vancomycin antibody, stabilizer, buffer salts, surfactant and  preservative,(17 mL).
1a EA Reagent: Contains 1.71 g/L Enzyme acceptor, buffer salts, stabilizer and preservative. 
2 ED Reconstitution Buffer: Contains Potassium Phosphate, buffer salts, surfactant and preservative, (17 mL).   
2a ED Reagent: Contains 25 nM Enzyme donor conjugated to vancomycin, 1.64 g/L chlorophenolred-β-D-galactopyranoside, buffer salts, stabilizer, and preservative.
Calibrators: Vancomycin Low Calibrator 2 x 7.5 mL
             Vancomycin High Calibrator 2 x 5.0 mL
applicantName: 杏全實業股份有限公司
efficacy: 定量分析人體血清或血漿中的萬古黴素(Vancomycin)。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: A 臨床化學及臨床毒理學
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: A.3950 萬古黴素試驗系統
